remarks: The Godel-set version of the Axiom Scheme of Replacement.  Since this is a scheme and not a single axiom, it manifests as a function on wffs, each giving rise to a different axiom.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.)
statement: df-gzrep $p |- AxRep = ( u e. ( Fmla ` _om ) |-> ( A.g 3o E.g 1o A.g 2o ( A.g 1o u ->g ( 2o =g 1o ) ) ->g A.g 1o A.g 2o ( ( 2o e.g 1o ) <->g E.g 3o ( ( 3o e.g (/) ) /\g A.g 1o u ) ) ) ) $.
